name: Decked Over
description:
Description

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2020 - Out Of Control!

You're playing D&D when you cast a spell that removes all ability to control your actions. Fortunately you still have a peculiar magic die that can influence what happens. Play, battle, get cards, roll dice, succeed - or not. You decide. (Actually you don't.)

Thanks a bunch if you play it!

Notes

Apologies I ran into some major bugs during build testing which left me no time to pop in a main menu, pause or an ending screen. But if you can't go any further - you're done. 

If you're on a windows build you'll have to force close the app - I am dreadfully sorry about this! 

Instructions

Game is played with the mouse. Select your chosen die value, and play the card or move that many spaces. Tiles are activated when you land on them (snakes & ladders).
